Esoterica.Name: YuriHakuEsoterica_WalkOnWaterTechnique
Esoterica.Desc: Through this technique the user has to be emitting a constant stream of Qi from the bottom of the their feet and using the repellent force to walk across the water's surface.
Esoterica.EffectDesc: This technique increases the user Speed, Adventure Speed and Max Qi.
